# hypertec Provider
Terraform provider for hypertec.cloud

## Example Usage

```hcl
variable "my_api_key" {}

provider "hypertec" {
    api_key = "${var.my_api_key}"
}
```


<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **api_key** (String)

### Optional

- **api_url** (String)
